All Implemented Interfaces:
DecoratorMapper
public class GrailsLayoutDecoratorMapper
extends AbstractDecoratorMapper

Implements the SiteMesh decorator mapper interface and allows grails views to map to grails layouts.

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
